thread.section_title: iTailor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTailor | itailor.com
thread.title: WD

author: WD
title: WD
text: I ordered a shirt from iTailor and was pleasantly surprised. The shirt was made of great quality materials and fit perfectly. I did use the standard sizing because I didn't want to make a mistake measuring myself. Every customization I asked for was done exactly as I had wanted it. The only bad thing is that it took a long time to receive my shirt. If they could cut their shipping time I'd be ecstatic.
